Un mode coop bien fun avec pas mal de possibilité pour troll ses amis et sinon le besoins de coopération en mode coop est bien géré (sans le mate ou si il fait n'importe quoi, c'est impossible d'avancé)
Gud game. All i gotta say^^

I think that there is so much to love about this game, the puzzles are challenging but not impossible (although I did get stuck for a while back when i first played this on my PS3) The characters are all phenomenal with some good jokes. If you have not played this then give it a try because it is very much worth the price for the experience you get out of it.

Muito bom pra zerar com algum amigo, bem divertido, e dificil

very good to run with friends, amazing, awesome puzzles
literally the best reviewed game on steam and its already an excellent game so get it now

Made the mistake of having Portal 2 be one of the first games I ever played - now nothing will ever live up to it! Guess I'll just have to replay it every year...

It's a classic for a reason, and if you haven't played it yet please do yourself a favor and do so.

Uno dei migliori level design mai visti: livelli sempre originali e mai ripetitivi. Divertimento, ironia, sarcasmo ed epicità assicurati. Una trama più che fine, che vanta uno dei migliori finali di sempre. Consigliato a chi vuole giocare un classico, che a distanza di 10 anni, è ancora fresco come una rosa di nuova generazione.
Love this game
Muy buen juego.

Please add a hint button somewhere for each level, I'm not big brain enough for this rip.

great game though!

This game has its moments; easy, intermediate and hard! I will admit that I did use YouTube and the portal Wiki to do some of the puzzles because i'm dumb :P Overall, this game was fun and i'm glad I finished it! Would recommend and I believe everyone should play it.

Realistically, no game is for everyone. Every game is bound to have at least [i] someone [/i] who doesn't like it. 

But when was the last time you heard anyone say that they don't like Portal 2
Best puzzle game i've played so far. And you can play it in almost any computer.

I make a daily pilgrimage to this game every year, 10/10, cant wait to be killed by my favourite robots again.
JUEGAZO
Fun

Its an amazing single player experience and its also very fun with friends. The story is rich, the puzzles are fun and sometimes challenging, the game is also a decent length. It took me about 8.5 hours to beat the single player story and 4-5 to beat the multiplayer portion. The multiplayer specifically is very fun since you can kill your friend and its kind of competitive thanks to glados being glados.

Oyunu az önce bitirdim. Portal oyununu gerçekten çok iyi geliştirmişler; ikinci oyunu daha çok sevdim. Oyunun sonunda ağlayacaktım, rahmetli Escobar dedemin bile gözleri yaşarmıştır. Çok güzel bir deneyimdi. Oyunların ikisini de indirimdeyken aldım, kartları satsam oyunun parası çıkıyor ki bu oyun 100 lira olsa bile alınır. Favorilerim arasına girdi.

Evin içinde delikler açıp odadan odaya, duvardan duvara geçmek istiyorum. Umarım en kısa zamanda geçer.
Очень затягиыающая игра, купмл на распродаже по скидке себе и другу. Играл сюжетку но в основном с другом. Рекомендую понапрягать мозги повеселится и убить время.
Топ игра если берёте по скидке. Играю с другом очень интересно и смешно
Its Portal. Literally two of the best games ever made. Do you really need convincing to check them out if you havent already?
bien.
One of my favorite games of all time. I absolutely love it
yeah

Oh shit,its not worth it.Only on sales.Dont get me wrong i love this game,but still,it has some major flaws:
1)Boring af.A  puzzle-solving game.What did u expect
2)Its very,but very f-ing hard.i literally have to play it with an open video walkthrough to watch how is it done(so basically the game is running while youtube is open with the game walkthrough)One of the hardest games i have every played,and i only have a few hours on record.i wonder what the final levels are like
3)Let me tell u Valve;s logic.An old game like this costs money,almost 10 dollars(8,19 dollars),but the biggest and most popular games valve made like csgo,tf2,dota 2,etc.are free.FREE.and this game,along with half life series and left 4 dead series costs MONEY.WHY?????? I mean it has very little content,and for a very hard and frustrating puzzle-solving game that is boring,with weak characters,it costs so much?????// damn.why is it so overrated.i will still play this game when im bored because its still a good game(overrated)but what i have written up there are just a few reasons its not worth the money.I could write an article about these.Just...just no.wait for a sale like i did.its gonna be very cheap,this time it only cost 0,81 dollars.(i did not even have to add funds to wallet,i just sold some csgo and tf2 skins on market and bought the game)
Buy it, it cool and stuff yeah...
Este y el Portal 2 son una joyita :D

играть лучше совместно так веселей, а так нормас игра
game bad phone good

Bonsoir, je me prénomme Jul. 
Je vais ici vous présenter mon avis sur le jeu tant connu portal 2 

Ce jeu comme tout autre, avec une violence extrême, déconseillé au moins de 3ans nous fait découvrir l'univers humanoïde des légumes. 

Mon avis : JE TROUVE çA HONTEUX MONSIEUR LES DÉVELOPPEURS VOUS CROYEZ QUE C'EST NORMAL DE POUVOIR SE TÉLÉPORTER D'UN MUR BLANC A UN AUTRE, C'est honteux, ce jeu n'est pas du tout réaliste ça se voit que c'est un jeu est un jeu qui est super cool et donc c'est pour cette raison que c'est n'importe quoi je vais me révolter tous seul dans ma chambre  

C'est pour ça que je recommande ce jeu mais c'est papi richard qui m'a forcé ( bisous aux dev je vous aime <3 )
